	- Accounts.getAccountBalances(uint256) (src/Accounts.sol#654-665)
	- Accounts.getBalance(uint256,IAsset,uint256) (src/Accounts.sol#644-647)
	- (toDelta_,toAdjustmentNeedAllowance) = _adjustBalance(toAccAdjustment,tradeId,true) (src/Accounts.sol#435)
		- heldAssets[accountId].push(HeldAsset(asset,subId.toUint96())) (src/Accounts.sol#589)
		- heldAssets[accountId][order] = assetToMove (src/Accounts.sol#607)

	- Accounts.heldAssets (src/Accounts.sol#47)

markdown:
Reentrancy in [Accounts.changeManager(uint256,IManager,bytes)](src/Accounts.sol#L126-L151):
	External calls:
	- [oldManager.handleManagerChange(accountId,newManager)](src/Accounts.sol#L134)
	- [IAsset(uniqueAssets[i]).handleManagerChange(accountId,newManager)](src/Accounts.sol#L140)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- [manager[accountId] = newManager](src/Accounts.sol#L144)
	[Accounts.manager](src/Accounts.sol#L38) can be used in cross function reentrancies:
	- [Accounts._adjustBalance(AccountStructs.AssetAdjustment,bool)](src/Accounts.sol#L480-L513)
	- [Accounts._assetHook(AccountStructs.AssetAdjustment,int256,address)](src/Accounts.sol#L544-L549)
	- [Accounts._createAccount(address,IManager)](src/Accounts.sol#L112-L117)
	- [Accounts._isApprovedOrOwner(address,uint256)](src/Accounts.sol#L658-L663)
	- [Accounts._managerHook(uint256,address,AccountStructs.AssetDelta[],bytes)](src/Accounts.sol#L528-L530)
	- [Accounts.changeManager(uint256,IManager,bytes)](src/Accounts.sol#L126-L151)
	- [Accounts.manager](src/Accounts.sol#L38)
	- [Accounts.onlyManager(uint256)](src/Accounts.sol#L62-L66)
	- [Accounts.onlyOwnerOrManagerOrERC721Approved(address,uint256)](src/Accounts.sol#L53-L60)
